params._minimalStake: Minimal stake value of XRT token (one quota price)
params._name: Lighthouse name,             example: 'my-name' will create 'my-name.lighthouse.4.robonomics.eth' domain
params._timeoutInBlocks: Max time of lighthouse silence in blocks
